The lectures slides have been made using [10 computer languages](index.html), including R, Bash, Latex, JavaScript, and markdown, among others.

## How to Use the presentations

- Press `space` or down-arrow ($\downarrow$) to go the next slide or see hidden contents.
- Press up-arrow ($\uparrow$) or `P` to go the previous slide.
- Press right arrow or left arrow to see next/previous chapter
- See more [here](https://defkey.com/reveal-js-shortcuts).

The `qdraw` plugin by [Abdullah Al Mahmud](https://www.thinkermahmud.com/qdraw/) is also available for all the slides, for annotation.
